Name: Sandra Patricia
description:
Sandra studied until High school, is married and her husband works as an electrician. They have a son who attend school and is on 3rd grade.
Sandra's mother also lives with her.

Sandra sells underwear. She started this business three years ago and she learned it from her mother who has a similar business.

Sandra will use the loan to buy more underwear and continue selling in her business.

She dreams of expanding her business and saving so her son attend school and become a professional.
